title.value: Improving the functioning of the system of production and technical services of agriculture
Повышение эффективности функционирования системы производственно-технического обслуживания сельского хозяйства

organization.name: Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

person.name: Sajganov, A.S., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: In course of the research there were considered the topical problem of increasing the efficiency of serving the agro-industrial complex. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were revealed the premise features of the formation and establishment of new market agro-service structures for multi-services to rural producers. On the basis of a deep and comprehensive analysis assessed the current state of development of the production and maintenance of agriculture and developed effective mechanisms, models, techniques, suggestions and recommendations to improve the efficiency of its operation. One of the important ways of increasing efficiency in the use of technical capacity in the field of agriculture - resource support improving of agricultural producers on the basis of leasing technology. The second relevant aspect of efficiency and technical potential in the agricultural production is to validate the optimal perspective structure and composition of the combine harvester park. It was revealed that the park of combine harvesters in the country in 2015 have to consist of 14 thousand units of engine that will make it possible to provide grain crop and grain legumes harvesting till 14 days.
